column1: #Text=Medal-seeking Spanish men arrive at 2014 Goalball World Championships
#Text=Spain 's men 's national goalball team arrived in Espoo , Finland Friday for the start of the 2014 IBSA Goalball World Championships .
#Text=The team comes into the tournament with the goal of securing a medal , which would qualify them for the 2016 Summer Paralympics in Rio de Janeiro .

#Text=Head coach Francisco Monreal said , " The objective is to reach the medal round , and qualify directly for the 2016 Games , but we need to be realistic and not think game by game , we can get a surprise . [ ... ]
